alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 5:41PM CDT until May 05 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hubert H Moss Lake, or 8 miles northwest of Gainesville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Muenster, Lindsay, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Marysville, Sivells Bend and Myra. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 500 and 503. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.
